gui.form.base

Class FormObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.form.base.FormObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChangeSubject, java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, CheckBox, InputBox, Label, ListBox, ListBox.ListBoxElement, MenuBar, MenuItem, RadioButton

    public abstract class FormObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<FormObject>, ChangeSubject
    Object that can be added to a Form.
